projects.description: Computer Craphics, Inc., aka C_C,  is a digital bodega and design agency based in NYC and LA. It specializes in unique digital projects that offer a modern take on the retro “craphics” of web design from the 90’s. C_C’s work is unmistakable and spans a wide variety of mediums: 3D animation, illustration, GIFs, augmented reality, virtual reality, fashion, web design, sound design and much more. The company was founded by Andrey and Denis, two talented artists that have created a nostalgic aesthetic that has been praised by computer geeks and designers all across the world. Their work has been featured in TechCrunch, Adage, Google, Adweek and TK. Email TK to book Computer Craphics, Inc. for your next rad project.

How video game tech makes neural networks possible
